results.RoleDescription:

results.RoleDescription:
Forecast Specialist (Oil & Gas) : 
Coordinates the complete production forecasting process. Is responsible to setup project, gather constraint data, forecast result calculation and its analysis. Evaluates various what-if scenarios before submitting the forecast results for approval.
